title: Encore: Diana to Meghan | Why You’re Wrong About Diana with Michael Hobbes | 5
description:
Think there’s nothing else we can get out of this story? Well, think again. Today we’re talking to Michael Hobbes, who’s a senior reporter at HuffPost and host of the podcast “You’re Wrong About.” We’ll talk to him about his show’s recent season on Princess Diana, her depiction in “The Crown,” and why we sometimes forget that she was still a woman with flaws.

To read Michael’s reporting at the HuffPost, follow this link: https://www.huffpost.com/author/michael-hobbes 

And listen to “You’re Wrong About” on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher or wherever you listen to podcasts.

Next, in our final episode of the year, we’ll be looking back at the most dizzying year in the lives of the rich and famous.

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App https://wondery.app.link/eventherich.


Support us by supporting our sponsors!
